name: DATE THE TOWER
description:
A Tower Defense game made for the Love Jam 2021.

Defend your house from some creepy crtitters, with the help of your roommates!

Currently, there are three enemy types, and three 'tower' types.

Post Jam I expect to add these features:

-More and better sound effects
-the rockets from the red-haired girl to fly in a more fun, slow turny way
-More stages
-dating sim game between stages to unlock the ability to upgrade towers, and for fun
